title: Edcrypto91
author: Edcrypto91
content: Hi there newbies I think most of your frequently asked questions are given in form of like a hint under some posts on different boards although most times it's usually under the first post or OP's post do well to always check it out it is very summarized but still carries a ton of information.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: These are known as factoids. I also came to know about them recently, as I was reading them for a lot of time but never hesitated to know more about them. But once a member made a post about Factoid then I came to know that we can apply to add and remove some factoids and there are some rules to that. I am mentioning these here for you OP and other people who are not aware of the factoids so that they can get some knowledge about it. :Re: Factoid slots. [Request] to update information, remove old ones & add new ones.The thing is, these quotations really are very informative and we should try to read them often o that we can get some more knowledge.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: I do noticed these hints also op, but never bother to check what it is called. I have also learned something new today thanks to your thread. These hints are very informative and I will advice some newbies to also take time to view them when it displays. They weren't placed there for no reason, but to serve as a means to inform users about some important things they should know about Bitcoin. Although some of them are no longer correct or updated but you can learn from those that are still up to date.
